# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty stroke path.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a new stroke path

- **init(controlPoints:creationDate:)**: Creates a stroke path with the cubic B-spline control points and a date that you specify.

items.description: Creates a stroke path with the cubic B-spline control points and a date that you specify.
items.name: init(controlPoints:creationDate:)
